Company: Cordova-Aguirre

Job Type: Unix System Administrator

About Us:
Cordova-Aguirre is a leading technology firm that provides innovative solutions to businesses worldwide. We value diversity, equity, and inclusion, and strive to create a workplace where everyone can thrive.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Unix System Administrator to join our team. As a Unix System Administrator, you will be responsible for ensuring the smooth operation of our Unix-based systems, including installation, configuration, and maintenance of hardware and software.

Responsibilities:

 Install, configure, and maintain Unix-based systems, including hardware and software
 Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues as needed
 Implement security measures to protect against cyber threats
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve technical issues
 Develop and maintain technical documentation

Qualifications and Experience:
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
 3+ years of experience in Unix system administration
 Strong knowledge of Unix operating systems, including Linux and Solaris
 Experience with scripting languages, such as Perl and Python
 Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $80,000 to $110,000 USD per year, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) matching, and paid time off.
